DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective chart review will demonstrate the feasibility of performing caudal epidural blockade in adolescents undergoing major orthopedic hip surgery and provide information regarding the feasibility of this technique's use on a regular basis.
DOC.brief_title: Caudal Epidural Block for Postoperative Analgesia in Adolescents Following Major Hip Surgery.
DOC.criteria: Adolescents that underwent major orthopedic hip surgery.
